'''Unreconciled Stars''' is an Event Chapter.

Requirements: {{Quest|20|display=fullSentence|requirements=1}}

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[Unknown Star]]
* Act II - [[The Crisis Deepens]]
* Act III - [[What the Skies Conceal, the Water Reveals]]
* Act IV - [[Where Ancient Stars Align]]

==Summary==
{{Description|Peculiar meteorites are descending upon [[Teyvat]], bringing a rare sleeping sickness with them. People trapped in deep slumber, mysterious dreams, an unknown star... The crisis draws closer!}}
===Act I - Unknown Star===
{{Main|Unknown Star}}
{{Description|Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild needs your help with something, and it seems big...|Incident Report}}
{{Description|"...The vanishing stars whisper of this world's enigmas, and the prelude to countless crises calamities begin to play.<br>"Sounds like trouble to me. Best get rid of them, then."|Unknown Star - Overture}}
{{Description|"The presence of these shards imbues the sleeping people's fates with the shades of deadly night."<br>"If we don't find a way to deal with them, even more people might get sick."|Unknown Star - Interlude}}
{{Description|After disposing of the meteorite shards with the help of the Prinzessin, the sleepers' situation seems to have improved. The people are sincerely grateful and offer you their very best wishes. Just as well, because you're going to need all the best wishes you can get &mdash; this is far from the final stop on your journey.|Incident Report}}
[[File:Act Unknown Star Ending.png|300px]]

===Act II - The Crisis Deepens===
{{Main|The Crisis Deepens}}
{{Description|"Let us seek counsel from one's Astral Emissary, for her wisdom shall surely shed light upon the whereabouts of these seeds of nefarious nightmares."<br>"So we need to ask [[Mona]] to calculate the position of the meteorites and salvage them... Got it."|Star of Deceitful Dreams}}
{{DIcon|Mona}} "Astrologist of the century" Mona joins Fischl in investigating the meteorite incident. Her ability to  pinpoint the meteorites' locations with the predictive powers of astrology proves to be an indispensable asset in the effort to contain the crisis.
After completing the first quest of Unknown Star, the following ''Three Meteoric Wave [[World Quests]]'' are unlocked:

===Act III - What the Skies Conceal, the Water Reveals===
{{Main|What the Skies Conceal, the Water Reveals}}
{{Description|"Surely, the fallen star that even the agents of chaos cannot ignore must be the abyss from whence this unholy darkness proceeds?"''<br>''"Alright, let's pool our collective strength and deal with this latest and largest meteorite."|Star of Destiny}}

===Act IV - Where Ancient Stars Align===
{{Main|Where Ancient Stars Align}}
''Where Ancient Stars Align'' is the epilogue chapter of the Unreconciled Stars event.
